text: From a New Yorker in Chicago with a kid in a counterpart to Stuyvesant: NYC officials have done double-takes at the far greater diversity in our selective enrollment public high schools. Systems deftly link academic excellence with tough issues of race/poverty. Study Chicago.
author: JimWarren55

text:
One Chicago Whole Foods cashier to another just now:
“I’m amazed more people aren’t buying the pine nuts. They go so well with pesto.” I guess. Wonder how the Pate de campagne is going.
author: JimWarren55
